modName: Remove Blood and Gore Mod - Skyrim For Teens
summary: If you\'ve got over-protective parents, this mod is for you. It removes most blood and gore from the game. Thanks to Citizen86, a Modder here, the blood is removed, and I put together a few things to touch it up and put it in this Mod pack. I have also removed some burnt bodies but it isn\'t perfect. Know that I am still working on it slowly.
descriptionHtml:
Want to make Skyrim more appropriate, as if it were rated T for teen? Now you can. Finally I have developed a working modification for that, along with Citizen86\'s mod for No blood, you can take away blood, gore, and a few more \"inappropriate\" things in the game, making it suitable for ages 14+.
 I\'m no ESRB rater, but after this mod is installed, with it, I\'d rate it
 TEEN for: Violence, Suggestive themes, Language.

 Alright, so my mod will come in a \"package\" (zipped folder) with both Citizen86\'s mod and mine, for convenience.
author: Citizen86 and Brinabananas and Bobozeez
